html.p: Proposition. If [mathjaxinline]A[/mathjaxinline] is an [mathjaxinline]m\times n[/mathjaxinline] matrix, [mathjaxinline]B[/mathjaxinline] is an [mathjaxinline]n\times p[/mathjaxinline] matrix, and [mathjaxinline]C[/mathjaxinline] is a [mathjaxinline]p\times q[/mathjaxinline] matrix, then [mathjaxinline]A(BC) = (AB)C[/mathjaxinline]. In other words, matrix multiplication is associative.
